name: The Very Literal Fall Of Atlantis
name_original: The Very Literal Fall Of Atlantis
description:
Survive the chaos of the last day of Atlantis in a stressful point and click physics platformer.

Use falling ruins to propulse yourself up to the surface while dealing with the worst trafic jam in the city history caused by other struggling atlanteans.

Extinction was never so much fun!!

Ana Jiménez - Art

Sergi Montaner - Programming

Pau Novau - Programming

External resources used:

http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/528426? - Music
